LanguageData.Defaults_GuestsCarryMedicine: Guests pick up medicine to carry, too
LanguageData.Defaults_ManualPriorities: Use manual work priorities by default
LanguageData.Defaults_WorkModeFirst: First mech control group work mode
LanguageData.Defaults_WorkModeSecond: Second mech control group work mode
LanguageData.Defaults_WorkModeAdditional: Additional mech control groups work mode
LanguageData.Defaults_ConfirmResetAllSettings: Do you want to reset all mod settings to their vanilla values? All settings categories will be enabled and all general settings will return to their default values. This action cannot be undone.
LanguageData.Defaults_ConfirmResetTheseSettings: Do you want to reset all {0} to their vanilla values? This action cannot be undone.
LanguageData.Defaults_ConfirmResetWorkbenchBills: Do you want to reset all default workbench bill settings to their vanilla values? This action will delete all default workbench bills and cannot be undone.
LanguageData.Defaults_UseScheduleTip: Indicates whether the schedule will automatically be assigned to colonists.
LanguageData.Defaults_AcceptRoyalFavorDesc:
Whether you wish to be rewarded with {0} from {1}.

If this is disabled, {1} will offer other types of rewards instead.

This setting only affects newly-arriving quests.
LanguageData.Defaults_AcceptGoodwillDesc:
Whether you wish to be rewarded via improved faction relations with {0}.

If this is disabled, {0} will offer other types of rewards instead.

This setting only affects newly-generated quests.
LanguageData.Defaults_PlantTypeTip: The default plant type for new growing zones.
LanguageData.Defaults_MedicineToCarryTip: The default medicine for pawns to carry when assigned.
LanguageData.Defaults_CorpseStockpileZoneDesc: Create a stockpile where your colonists will store corpses.\nThis tool can also expand any existing stockpile.
LanguageData.Defaults_CantDeleteDefaultPolicy: You cannot delete the default policy.
LanguageData.Defaults_LockSetting: Lock this setting to prevent automatic changes when new mods or DLC are added
LanguageData.Defaults_UseBillTip: Indicates whether this bill will automatically be added to new workbenches.
LanguageData.Defaults_NewPoliciesDLC: 1trickPwnyta's Defaults can incorporate policies available in newly installed DLC if you'd like. {0} adds the following default policies to the game. Select the ones you want to enable.
LanguageData.Defaults_HostilityReponseTip: Change how colonists will react to nearby enemies when not drafted.
LanguageData.Defaults_NoSearchResults: Your search "{0}" did not match any settings.
LanguageData.Defaults_ChooseRewardsDesc: Tell other factions what kinds of rewards you want in quests.
LanguageData.Defaults_ConfirmResetStockpileZoneSettin: Do you want to reset all default stockpile zone settings to their vanilla values? This action will delete all custom stockpile zones as well and cannot be undone.
LanguageData.Defaults_ConfirmResetAllowedAreaSettings: Do you want to reset all default allowed area settings to their vanilla values? This action will delete all allowed areas and cannot be undone.
LanguageData.Defaults_FullAreaTip: This allowed area will include the full map by default.
LanguageData.Defaults_EmptyAreaTip: This allowed area will be empty by default.
LanguageData.Defaults_ClickToChangeAllowedAreaColor: Click to change allowed area color.
LanguageData.Defaults_SettingsCategoryDisabled: {0} are currently disabled and will not affect gameplay.
LanguageData.Defaults_RestartRequiredDesc: Disabling or enabling entire settings categories will not take effect until the game is restarted. Do you want to restart now?
LanguageData.Defaults_EnableCategoryToViewSettings: You need to enable {0} and then restart the game in order to view these settings.
LanguageData.Defaults_BillsLimitedto15: Only the first 15 bills will apply to workbenches built in the game. To remove this limit, change the global bill settings.
LanguageData.Defaults_BasicWorkPrioritiesDesc: Select a work priority for each work type. New colonists will automatically be assigned those priorities when they join your colony.
LanguageData.Defaults_AdvancedWorkPrioritiesDesc: Customize the logic for determining the work priority for each work type. New colonists will automatically be assigned priorities based on your custom logic when they join your colony.
LanguageData.Defaults_WorkPriorityRulesGlobalDesc: Global rules apply to all work types.
LanguageData.Defaults_WorkPriorityRulesSpecificDesc: Each work type can have its own specific rules. These rules are applied after the global rules are applied.
LanguageData.Defaults_WorkPriorityRulesDesc: Rules apply in order from top to bottom.
LanguageData.Defaults_WorkPriorityAllowDecreaseToZero: Allow disabling this work type if the priority is decreased beyond {0}
LanguageData.Defaults_WorkPriorityAllowIncreaseFromZe: Allow enabling this work type if it is not already
LanguageData.Defaults_WorkPriorityRulesInvalid: Missing condition and/or effect. Define them or delete this rule.
LanguageData.Defaults_InvalidFolder: The path {0} does not exist and couldn't be created.
LanguageData.Defaults_PathTooLong: The file name is too long.
LanguageData.Defaults_SettingsBackupFailed: Failed to back up default settings: {0}
LanguageData.Defaults_SettingsBackupComplete: Defaults settings backup successfully created as {0}.
LanguageData.Defaults_EnterBackupName: Enter a file name for the backup.
LanguageData.Defaults_SelectBackupFile: Select a backup file to restore from. This action cannot be undone.
LanguageData.Defaults_SettingsRestoreFailed: Failed to restore default settings from backup: {0}
LanguageData.Defaults_ResetAllSettingsComplete: All settings have been successfully reset to their vanilla values.
LanguageData.Defaults_SettingsBackupDuration_TimeInte: Keep backup files for X days...
LanguageData.Defaults_SettingsBackupPurgeFailed: Failed to purge old default settings backups: {0}
LanguageData.Defaults_SettingsBackupOptionsDesc: This mod's settings can be backed up regularly so that if anything goes awry, you don't need to lose all the work you put into crafting your perfect defaults.
LanguageData.Defaults_PinBackup: Pinned backups are exempt from being routinely purged.
LanguageData.Defaults_ConfirmOverwriteBackup: {0} already exists and will be overwritten.
LanguageData.Defaults_GetBackupFilesFailed: Failed to get settings backup files from {0}: {1}
LanguageData.Defaults_NoBackupsToRestore: No default settings backup files found in {0}.
LanguageData.Defaults_ResetFishingZoneDesc: Reset all fishing zone settings to default settings.
LanguageData.Defaults_SetDefaultFishingZoneDesc: Save this fishing zone's settings as the default for all new fishing zones going forward.
LanguageData.CommandResetTempDesc: Reset the target temperature to default temperature.
